title: INTERNALERROR when exception in __repr__

labels.name: type: bug
labels.description: problem that needs to be addressed

labels.name: good first issue
labels.description: easy issue that is friendly to new contributor

labels.name: topic: tracebacks
labels.description: related to displaying and handling of tracebacks

body:
Minimal code to reproduce the issue: 
```python
class SomeClass:
    def __getattribute__(self, attr):
        raise
    def __repr__(self):
        raise
def test():
    SomeClass().attr
```
